description: This PHP source file manages the port forwarding configuration page in a web-based router or gateway interface. It includes PHP code for dynamic content generation and JavaScript for UI interactions such as enabling/disabling port forwarding and handling user actions like adding, editing, or deleting forwarding rules.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string value for a given parameter from the device configuration.

methods.name: DmExtGetInstanceIds
methods.description: Fetches instance IDs for a given device configuration object.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves multiple parameters' values for specified device objects.
